YOLOv8-Only.comment: Single-stage approach struggles with complex intent prediction

ViT-Only.comment: Good intent prediction but slow and poor detection

Naive-Fusion.comment: Better than single-stage but inferior to internal conditioning

P-SAFE (Ours).comment: Best overall performance with real-time speed

architecture_highlights.two_stage_design: YOLOv8-Nano for fast detection, ViT for intent refinement
architecture_highlights.internal_conditioning: Age information injected as token into ViT (not late fusion)
architecture_highlights.efficiency: Real-time capable on edge devices (RTX 4090: 32.5 FPS)
